translation.twi: Na wonnim nea wɔahu mpo.

translation.en: Do you want me to explain it to you?
translation.twi: Wopɛ sɛ mekyerɛkyerɛ mu kyerɛ wo?

translation.en: I can't believe you're talking to me like this.
translation.twi: Mingye di sɛ wo ne me rekasa saa.

translation.en: I can't find my gloves.
translation.twi: Mintumi nhu me bag.

translation.en: There must be some misunderstanding between us.
translation.twi: Ɛsɛ sɛ akasakasa bi ba yɛn ntam.

translation.en: Asamoah can't believe Esi knows why John doesn't like her.
translation.twi: Asamoah ntumi nnye Esi de, saa ara na John nso nim nea enti a ɔmpɛ n'asɛm.

translation.en: I thought you didn't want to come.
translation.twi: Na medwene sɛ wompɛ sɛ woba.

translation.en: He is as old as my father.
translation.twi: Wanyin sɛ me papa ara.

translation.en: She looked at her watch and noted that it was past five.
translation.twi: Ɔhwɛɛ n'ani so na ohui sɛ wadi mfe anum.

translation.en: Read it once more, please.
translation.twi: Yɛsrɛ wo san kenkan bio.

translation.en: I'm afraid I can't do that.
translation.twi: Ɛyɛ me sɛ mintumi nyɛ saa.

translation.en: What did you hope to accomplish?
translation.twi: Dɛn na na wohwɛ kwan sɛ wobɛyɛ?

translation.en: Do you know who made it?
translation.twi: Wunim onii ko a ɔyɛe?

translation.en: We sat in a ring.
translation.twi: Yɛtraa ring bi mu.

translation.en: Do you know much about Asamoah?
translation.twi: So wunim Asamoah ho nsɛm pii?

translation.en: There have been a lot of complaints recently about drivers not obeying the speed limits in downtown Boston.
translation.twi: Nnansa yi, anwiinwii pii asɔre wɔ karkafo a wɔmfa mmirika mmra nni dwuma wɔ Boston kurom no ho.

translation.en: Kwabena talked too much and let the secret slip.
translation.twi: Kwabena kasa kɔɔ akyiri dodo, na ɔmaa ahintasɛm no daa adi.

translation.en: She said that he was handsome.
translation.twi: Ɔkae sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ.

translation.en: I'll be back on Monday.
translation.twi: Mɛsan aba Dwoda.

translation.en: The boy must have broken the window.
translation.twi: Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ abarimaa no bubuu mpomma no mu.

translation.en: I shouldn't have put my laptop so close to the edge of the table.
translation.twi: Na anka ɛnsɛ sɛ mede me kɔmputa no to ɔpon no ano pɛɛ.
